snippet: For its latest “A Midsummer Night’s Dream,” New York City Ballet did detective work to make sure the period costumes were accurate.
abstract: New York City Ballet is meticulously recreating accurate period costumes for its latest production of George Balanchine's A Midsummer Night's Dream ballet.
lead_paragraph: For its latest “A Midsummer Night’s Dream,” New York City Ballet did detective work to make sure the period costumes were accurate.
